info.title: ishield.ai Conversational API specifications
info.description: Conversational content analysis API for ishield.ai

post.description: Analyze message posted on a team or one-on-one/ group chat, on which Dost is installed.

teamId.description: Team or channel identifier of the organization

registryUserId.description: User's unique identifier in the organization

messageText.description: Message text that was or is to be posted

authToken.description: Authentication token (if required) to extract the attachment

200.description: Results based on analysis of the message

contextualIssues.description: Contextual issues such as microaggression, stereotypes

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url http://localhost:3000/api/analyzeMessage \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"tenantId":"zxyorg.slack.com","teamId":"testteam_20220219_03","registryUserId":"usr09871","email":"jennygraham@myorg.com","conversationType":"channel","messageText":"This is a regular message","files":[{"contentUrl":"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png","authToken":"juy_shq16$8998"}]}'

echo '{"tenantId":"zxyorg.slack.com","teamId":"testteam_20220219_03","registryUserId":"usr09871","email":"jennygraham@myorg.com","conversationType":"channel","messageText":"This is a regular message","files":[{"contentUrl":"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png","authToken":"juy_shq16$8998"}]}' |  \
  http POST http://localhost:3000/api/analyzeMessage \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPConnection("localhost:3000")

payload = "{\"tenantId\":\"zxyorg.slack.com\",\"teamId\":\"testteam_20220219_03\",\"registryUserId\":\"usr09871\",\"email\":\"jennygraham@myorg.com\",\"conversationType\":\"channel\",\"messageText\":\"This is a regular message\",\"files\":[{\"contentUrl\":\"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png\",\"authToken\":\"juy_shq16$8998\"}]}"

headers = { 'content-type': "application/json" }

conn.request("POST", "/api/analyzeMessage", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_PORT => "3000",
  CURLOPT_URL => "http://localhost:3000/api/analyzeMessage",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "POST",
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => "{\"tenantId\":\"zxyorg.slack.com\",\"teamId\":\"testteam_20220219_03\",\"registryUserId\":\"usr09871\",\"email\":\"jennygraham@myorg.com\",\"conversationType\":\"channel\",\"messageText\":\"This is a regular message\",\"files\":[{\"contentUrl\":\"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png\",\"authToken\":\"juy_shq16$8998\"}]}",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('http://localhost:3000/api/analyzeMessage');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
]);

$request->setBody('{"tenantId":"zxyorg.slack.com","teamId":"testteam_20220219_03","registryUserId":"usr09871","email":"jennygraham@myorg.com","conversationType":"channel","messageText":"This is a regular message","files":[{"contentUrl":"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png","authToken":"juy_shq16$8998"}]}');

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"tenantId":"zxyorg.slack.com","teamId":"testteam_20220219_03","registryUserId":"usr09871","email":"jennygraham@myorg.com","conversationType":"channel","messageText":"This is a regular message","files":[{"contentUrl":"https://xyzorg.com/media/abc123.png","authToken":"juy_shq16$8998"}]}');

$request->setRequestUrl('http://localhost:3000/api/analyzeMessage');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();
